RESET_PASSWORD_MESSAGE: You have requested to reset your password. Please click the link below to reset your password:
RESET_PASSWORD_IGNORE: If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email.
RESET_PASSWORD_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Your password has been reset successfully.
RESET_PASSWORD_SUCCESS_LOGIN: You can now log in with your new password.
RESET_PASSWORD_SUCCESS_SECURITY: If you did not make this change, please contact us immediately.
